import rhinoscriptsyntax as rs
import Rhino.Geometry as rg
import Rhino

tol = Rhino.RhinoDoc.ActiveDoc.ModelAbsoluteTolerance
a = []

for i in x:
    for j in x:
        if j == i: continue
        trmd = i.Trim(j, tol)
        if trmd!=None and len(trmd)>0:
            i = trmd[0]
    a.append(i)

intersections = a
